item.title: Officer killed, gunman dead in shooting at CDC and Emory campus in Atlanta
item.description: Police in Atlanta say the suspect is dead and there is no ongoing threat after reports of an active shooter near Emory University and the CDC headquar...

item.title: 8/8: CBS Evening News
item.description: Trump, Putin to hold meeting in Alaska next week; Bed Bath & Beyond returns with new store in Nashville

item.title: Judge bars Beto O'Rourke's PAC from funding Texas Democrats in redistricting standoff
item.description: Texas AG Ken Paxton accused Beto O'Rourke's Powered by People of deceptive fundraising. O'Rourke vowed to keep fighting and plans a Fort Worth rally.
